trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection 類別逐一查看集合的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取這個集合的物件使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection 類別也會用於建立自訂型別延伸<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>類別。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>物件至這個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此方法會將指定<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>如果它並未已經包含在集合中的物件。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>来加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>来加入的物件。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是周圍的包裝函式<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: 這會將複製<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製之物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 要開始複製處的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
trans-unit.target: 長度 array 的值少於加上 index 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的區段群組的數目。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示集合中的區段群組的數字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>集合中包含的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是周圍的包裝函式<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>要傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是周圍的包裝函式<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>要傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>具有指定名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: name is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: name為 null 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用來逐一查看<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>物件包含在這個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵，所要傳回的區段群組索引。

trans-unit.source: The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Used by the system during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化期間使用的系統。

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 序列化; 期間使用 GetObjectData 方法也就是說，當保存的組態檔的組態資料。

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 適用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>其索引已指定集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>要傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，這個屬性是索引子<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>名稱從集合中指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>要傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref>具有指定名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，這個屬性是索引子<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有索引鍵<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>物件包含在這個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> object that contains the names of all section groups in this collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>物件，其中包含此集合中的所有區段群組名稱。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>物件名稱指定從這個<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的區段群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref>其索引已指定從這個物件<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的區段群組索引。
